Burbank.Monte Vista Hotel:
Not to be confused with the Hotel Monte Vista in Flagstaff, Arizona.
Los Angeles County's fashionable Monte Vista Hotel was situated at today's Fenwick Street and Floralita Avenue in Sunland, California, a district of Los Angeles, between 1887, when it was built, and 1964, when it was demolished. In its early years it was used as an "elegant retreat for wealthy Los Angeles area sportsmen," who make their way to Glendale, California, and then take a stage to Tujunga and the lodge.
